column6: SOMETHING CAN STOP THE JUGGERNAUT! PART 1 When a pounding Spider-Sense headache leads Spider-Man to the comatose body of his biggest, toughest foe, he realizes that something -- or someone -- can indeed stop the Juggernaut! But who?
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | writer:Roger Stern | editor:Stephen Wacker | penciller (cover):Lee Weeks | penciller (cover):Dean White
